meanings: give aid to the injured[the wounded]
give first aid to the wounded

vlive.korean: 여기 부상자 있어요. - 무슨 일 있었어요? Someone got hurt! - Did something happen just now? 듣기 View video Apink : [REPLAY] 2017 GLOBAL V LIVE TOP10 - Apink
vlive.english: Someone got hurt! - Did something happen just now?

vlive.korean: 길 가다 보면 교통사고 안내판처럼 어제의 사망자, 어제의 부상자. It's like the traffic accident sign on the street saying the number of death and injured. 듣기 View video V Animal Family : 사지말고 '입양'하세요..♥ Don't buy, 'Adopt'!
vlive.english: It's like the traffic accident sign on the street saying the number of death and injured.

examples.korean: All the sick and wounded were evacuated. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 모든 환자들과 부상자들을 피신시켰다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: All the sick and wounded were evacuated. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The injured were carried away on stretchers. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 부상자들은 들것에 실려 옮겨졌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The injured were carried away on stretchers. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Ambulance crews were tending to the injured. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 구급차 요원들이 부상자들을 돌보고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Ambulance crews were tending to the injured. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Paramedics treated the injured at the roadside. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 긴급 의료원들이 부상자들을 길가에서 치료했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Paramedics treated the injured at the roadside. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Ambulances rushed the injured to the hospital. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 구급차들이 부상자들을 급히 병원으로 실어 날랐다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Ambulances rushed the injured to the hospital. Add to Wordbook
